00026 
00027 #include <GisCommon.h>
00028 #include <geometry/IEnvelope.h>
00029 #include <common/Dimensionality.h>
00030 #include <common/GeometryType.h>
00031 #include <common/Collection.h>
00032 /// \brief
00033 /// The GisIGeometry class defines the properties and methods common to all geometric
00034 /// types.  GisIGeometry is an abstract type.
00035 class GisIGeometry : public GisIDisposable
00036 {
00037 public:
00038 
00039     /// \brief
00040     /// Gets the envelope for the Geometry.
00041     /// 
00042     /// \return
00043     /// Returns the envelope
00044     /// 
00045     GISGEOM_API virtual GisIEnvelope* GetEnvelope() const = 0;
00046 
00047     /// \brief
00048     /// Gets the dimensionality of ordinates in this object.
00049     /// 
00050     /// \remarks
00051     ///  Values are from the GisDimensionality enumeration.
00052     /// A return type of "GisInt32" is used instead of the enumeration, catering to typical use with bit masking.
00053     /// 
00054     /// \return
00055     /// Returns the ordinate dimensionality
00056     /// 
00057     GISGEOM_API virtual GisInt32 GetDimensionality() const = 0;
00058 
00059     /// \brief
00060     /// Gets the type of the most-derived interface 
00061     /// in the Geometry package for this object
00062     /// 
00063     /// \remarks
00064     ///  The derived type indicates to what class the object may safely be cast.
00065     /// 
00066     /// \return
00067     /// Returns the derived type
00068     /// 
00069     GISGEOM_API virtual GisGeometryType GetDerivedType() const = 0;
00070 
00071     /// \brief
00072     /// Gets the text string representation of this Geometry.
00073     /// 
00074     /// \remarks
00075     /// This object retains ownership of the string.
00076     /// The caller should NOT attempt to free it.
00077     /// The text string may be retained in memory by the object indefinitely.
00078     /// Calling this method on a large number of Geometries that are retained
00079     /// in memory may cause a noticable increase in memory consumption.
00080     /// 
00081     /// \return
00082     /// Returns the text string
00083     /// 
00084     GISGEOM_API virtual GisString* GetText() = 0;
00085 
00086 protected:
00087 
00088     /// \brief
00089     /// Constructs a default instance.
00090     /// 
00091     /// \return
00092     /// Returns nothing
00093     /// 
00094     GISGEOM_API GisIGeometry() {};
00095 
00096     /// \brief
00097     /// Default destructor.
00098     /// 
00099     /// \return
00100     /// Returns nothing
00101     /// 
00102     GISGEOM_API virtual ~GisIGeometry() {};
00103 };
00104 
00105 
00106 /// \brief
00107 ///  Collection of CurvePolygon objects.
00108 class GisGeometryCollection : public GisCollection<GisIGeometry, GisException>
00109 {
00110 public:
00111     /// \brief
00112     ///  Creates an instance of GisGeometryCollection with no contained elements.
00113     /// 
00114     /// \return
00115     /// Returns an empty collection
00116     /// 
00117     static GisGeometryCollection* Create()
00118     {
00119         GisGeometryCollection* value = new GisGeometryCollection();
00120         if (NULL == value)
00121             throw GisException::Create(GisException::NLSGetMessage(GIS_NLSID(GIS_1_BADALLOC)));
00122 
00123         return value;
00124     }
00125 
00126 protected:
00127     void Dispose()
00128     {
00129         delete this;
00130     }
00131 };
00132 #endif
